desc:
Passive: Cooldown Reduction - Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 25%.

Passive: Spell Lifesteal - A percentage of damage caused by spells is returned to the caster as health.
attrib:
+ 25 Intelligence
+ 450 Health
+ 400 Mana
+ 4 HP Regeneration
+ 100% Mana Regeneration
COOLDOWN REDUCTION: 25%
HERO SPELL LIFESTEAL: 25%
CREEP SPELL LIFESTEAL: 5%
lore: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.
